website_summaries.verdict: Powerful laptop in a thin, sleek profile. Perfect for on-the-go users who need a powerful computer.
pros: Magnesium alloy chassis makes for a deceptively strong computer, in spite of its thin frame
Weight is under five pounds, making it the most packable Alienware ever made
Boasts high-end graphics, powerful processor and up to 32GB of RAM
cons: Does not have as many options as the Area-51 M or older Alienware 15 or 17 models

customer_reviews.title: Better deal than Dell.com
customer_reviews.text: Super fast Wifi, super smooth for Total War games. HDMI2 output 4K to my LG 4K monitor very well. The same configuration would be $1900 on Dell.com. Cancelled my order from Dell.com and reorder it on Amazon.com. Plus getting 3% back using Amazon Prime card.
customer_reviews.author: Y. F. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Ok laptop but with issues
customer_reviews.text: So the laptop has amazing build quality graphics are good 110+FPS in 1080P but the Screen is only a 60HZ display but ok for traveling but my main issue why I’m giving a 2 stars is that the backlight keyboard has stop working and the AlienFX software is very buggy and crashes I contacted DELL and they did updates and reinstall software but no luck and they told me to send to laptop back for repair and for a laptop I only have for 4 days kinda ridiculous why not just exchange it but whatever I update this review when I get the laptop back
customer_reviews.author: Rodell Pascua

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Engineering
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop for about 1.5 months. Had not even begun to do any gaming just watching Netflix and UFC Fight Pass. Computer froze and made a loud constant noise so I shut it down manually. Tried to boot up again but just have a black screen. Searched online and found out this is a common problem and they have a faulty motherboard. Since I live abroad, the shipping costs and tax I would have to pay on my laptop coming back would be nearly 80% and Dell won't allow for it to be serviced outside the US or Canada even though we have a Dell support center next to my house. Complete waste of $1500. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: When I played PUBG, It turned off by itself everytime
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: no documentation provided
customer_reviews.text: The parcel as delivered contained the computer and the power cables. And that's all. There were no setup or operating procedures in the box. I have many years experience with using laptops so I could manage but this sort of poor customer support needs correction.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Daley

customer_reviews.title: ALERT!!!! May not be genuine!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product. Had a battery problem within a month. Called Dell support and they couldn’t lookup this laptop in their system. When asked they told its not registered. I called amazon for the Dell order number so that Dell can register my laptop and get me the warranty. But amazon doesn’t have it too. I doubt if it’s GENUINE. It’s scam. Pls be aware,
customer_reviews.author: Karthik Karkala

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop overall, have not had a chance to fully run it through the wringer yet
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop overall, have not had a chance to fully run it through the wringer yet. Looks like it came without the heat sink for either one of the M.2 SSDs and the second slot doesn't even have a screw I can use to mount the drive, I had to buy one. Is there a thermal heat sink that can be used with this/should have been there?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this laptop my son liked it but two months after the time to return ended on may 31. The graphics started going badly. We are going to take it to geek squad to see if the graphics card needs to be replaced. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Technically supported product
customer_reviews.text: The Software is nice, but the Hardware is Fully Chinese even Rams from SKhynix China, not even Korean ! Also the Plastic of the Laptop is so weak I recommend you chose another type of Alienware !
customer_reviews.author: Belal Hmedan1

customer_reviews.title: Really great gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: This computer is fascinating, it works really fast and provides great pictures, it takes time to get it set up though
customer_reviews.author: Mr Z

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and pretty design
customer_reviews.text: Its a very great product, if you are a gamer this is for you, if not, this powerful lap helps you for processing faster your programs. The design is beautiful, is a heavy item, but powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Gonzalez Campos

customer_reviews.title: Not the value for the money you pay
customer_reviews.text: Overheats. One speaker broke, sent it for replacement, came broken again, gave it again for a replacement. Really bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Vlado

customer_reviews.title: To much money for play better buy a ps4 or Xbox
customer_reviews.text: This is piece a garbage no good at all no recomendable to buy
customer_reviews.author: olmede gramajo

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: I found the performance outstanding, not only were all my games very smother and fast but the quality on the screen was clear. I have had no problems with this sense I had purchased it. Having troubles with other gaming brands, the fact that I have a competent laptop to game on defiantly improves my game play and has got me into many new games that my old laptop couldn't run with out the lowest possible settings. Such a great product, would recommend to any of my friends looking for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: GunnarO

customer_reviews.title: It gets HOT! Even on Minecraft haha.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this laptop and I’m already trying to send it back. It gets HOT! Why hotter than your thinking. It plays freaking awesome though. I’m just worried about how the heating might damage it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Civilnova9

product_meta.title: Alienware m15 Gaming Laptop 15.6 inch FHD, 8th Generation Intel Core i7-8750H, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Max-Q design, 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD, 16GB RAM, Windows 10 home - Epic Silver (AWm15-7861SLV-PUS)
product_meta.description: Alienware M15 thin 15" Gaming Laptop silver-i7-16gb memory-128 SSD hard drive-gtx 1070 graphics display. 15-Inch gaming Laptop with the thinnest Alienware design ever. Featuring exceptional battery life, Premium materials and impressive power.
feature_bullets: Display: 15.6" FHD (1920 x 1080) 60Hz Anti-Glare IPS, 300-nits 72% color gamut, Narrow-Border Display
Processor: 8th Generation Intel Core i7-8750H (6-Core, 9MB Cache, up to 4.1GHz w/ Turbo Boost)
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Max-Q design
Memory and Storage: 16GB RAM, 2x8GB, DDR4, 2666MHz and 128GB PCIe M.2 SSD + 1TB (+8GB SSHD) Hybrid Drive
